name: The copper button of Lucifer
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
